short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes semi-transparent overlays from video's on mouseover

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you watch videos on popular streaming sites, sometimes you can get semi-transparent overlays on the video causing the video to unnaturally darken or blur.

This extension removes the semi-transparent overlays that can appear when you mouseover on a video, so you can clearly watch the video and still interact with it.   Simply click the extension to activate it and remove any potential overlays.

Works with amazon, max, netflix, mgm, disney, youtube, crackle, peacock, tubi, pluto, roku, and xumo

Options allow manual activation or automatic activation for overlays and controls.
